comments:
Integration build 20020508 (1411)

0. Brand new install
1. launch eclipse.exe -debug
2. Help -> Update Manager
3. open Updates -> My Computer -> c:\temp\ -> RedDotSite -> Red Dot Versions
   -> Red Dot Feature 1.0.0
(this is an unzip of the RedDotSite you gave me several weeks back)
4. hit Install in Preview view

Observe: Nothing happens.  The console and log
show an NPE being caught by event loop.

Expectation: The feature should be installed.

Need fix or workaround asap.

.log follows
